titles: At a general court held at Boston May the 3d, 1676 by the court, Edward Rawson, secretary.
author: Massachusetts. General Court.
Rawson, Edward, 1615-1693.
notes: Imprint suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
First line of text: For the preventing of justice and inequality in the discharge and payment of disbursements made by any particular persons or towns for the carrying on of this present warr.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
